Module Game
Package Model

Class PossibleCheck

java.lang.Object
Model.PossibleCheck
public class PossibleCheck extends Object
This class keeps track of pieces that are on the board, also handles checks, when an attempt of movement is made, it goes also through this class, and it adds all checks opponent can make into arrayList.
